title: Basic Bio-Bistro
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Salad bar, Bakery, German, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. The basic-bistro is attached to the basic-supermarket. Offers some vegan sandwiches (with hummus or tofu burger), a vegetarian/vegan self-sevice salad bar with dishes like couscous, noodle, bulgur, raw carrot, beetroot, salad, and vegetarian dressings; plus vegetarian soups, smoothies.
